docs.snippet: In the wake of the Marxist guerrilla attack on an army garrison last weekend, President Juan D. Peron has extended his purge of leftists in his movemeant and is pressing for strict antiterrorist legislation....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the wake of the Marxist guerrilla attack on an army garrison last weekend, President Juan D. Peron has extended his purge of leftists in his movemeant and is pressing for strict antiterrorist legislation.
docs.abstract: Policemen in Buenos Aires on Jan 28 confiscate and burn late editions of left-wing newspaper El Mundo as part of Pres Juan D Peron's leftists in his movement

docs.snippet: " Theater in America," a series of plays produced for public television by WNET/ 13, begins tonight at 8:30 with Maxim Gorky's "Enemies." The production, codirected by Ellis Raab and Kirk Browning, was originally mounted by the Repertory Theater o...
docs.lead_paragraph: " Theater in America," a series of plays produced for public television by WNET/ 13, begins tonight at 8:30 with Maxim Gorky's "Enemies." The production, codirected by Ellis Raab and Kirk Browning, was originally mounted by the Repertory Theater of Lincoln Center in 1972, before the installment of Joseph Papp at Lincoln Center.
docs.abstract: J J O'Connor revs WNET's Theater in America production of Maxim Gorky's Enemies; production is directed by Ellis Raab and Kirk Browning and stars Peter Donat and Frances Sternhagen; O'Connor also revs productions of June Moon and Cyrano De Bergerac

headline.main: Filly Owned By Chankin Wins Stakes

docs.snippet: IT is sobering to reflect that while 92 per cent of the households in this country have television, only 86 per cent have indoor plumbing. I read somewhere that TV is now regarded as a necessity for families on welfare and no doubt it is....
docs.lead_paragraph: IT is sobering to reflect that while 92 per cent of the households in this country have television, only 86 per cent have indoor plumbing. I read somewhere that TV is now regarded as a necessity for families on welfare and no doubt it is.

headline.main: ' I Took to TV Like an Alcoholic to Demon Rum'; Like and Alcoholic to Rum'

docs.lead_paragraph: EAST ORANGE--A world-renowned New Jersey scientist continued to search last week for new links between cigarettes and disease, while a group of 26 central Jersey residents completed the seventh week of a course designed to help them "kick the smoking habit."
docs.abstract: continued efforts of Dr Oscar Auerbach to discover new link between cigarette smoking and disease and efforts of NJ residents to break smoking habit through 'Smokenders,' course designed by Jacquelin and Jon Rogers, discussed; illus

headline.main: Smoking: The Battle for Health; Smoking: Battle for Health Continues

docs.snippet: Developing shortages of oil and other vital resources add a new dimension of urgency to worldwide efforts to curb population growth. Because of recent advances in birth control techniques and a marked decline in fertility In this country in recent...
docs.lead_paragraph: Developing shortages of oil and other vital resources add a new dimension of urgency to worldwide efforts to curb population growth. Because of recent advances in birth control techniques and a marked decline in fertility In this country in recent years many Americans tend to believe that the population problem is well on the way to solution. That unfortunately is not the case.
docs.abstract: ed says energy crisis adds new dimension of urgency to worldwide efforts to curb population growth; says inadequacy of family planning methods should place high priority on research in contraception and reproduction; notes US expenditures have peaked at $61-million, while recommended expenditures range between $100- and $200-million
